uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.session

Enum Hash

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Hash>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.session.Hash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Hash>

    public enum Hash
extends java.lang.Enum<Hash>
    Enum of possible password hash algorithms When stored in the database we can use numeric codes to avoid making the algorithm used too explicit if data is exposed. Note the Enum.toString() method should return the standard name used to retrieve the
